section.title: Lifestyle Extension Interfaces
section.p: A container manages extensions using an extension handler. Handlers may implement the Creator and/or Accessor interfaces. A creator extension will be activated during the create and destroy stages of a component lifecycle. A accessor extension will be activated during the access and release stages.

section.title: The Creator Interface
section.p: The Creator interface describes the create and destroy stages that occur between a component and a container during service management. Lifecycle extensions supporting create and destroy stages must implement this interface.

section.title: Accessor Interface
section.p: The Accessor interface describes the access and release stages that occur between a service or component manager and a container during service deployment. Lifecycle extensions supporting access and release stages must implement this interface.
